block.p: Tammie Green had a hole-in-one and an eagle in an eight-under-par 64 yesterday to take the second-round lead in the Safeco Classic in Kent, Wash.

Green, a four-time winner in 10 seasons on the L.P.G.A. Tour, had a nine-under 135 total on the Meridian Valley course. The defending champion, Patty Sheehan, was two back along with Val Skinner, Sharon Barrett and Karrie Webb. (AP)

WILKINSON TAKES EARLY LEAD: Jim Wilkinson turned in his best round on the PGA Senior Tour, a six-under-par 66, to take the first-round lead in the Bank One Classic in Lexington, Ky. Wilkinson finished the par-72 Kearney Hill Links course with seven birdies and one bogey. (AP)

Fifth-seeded Sergi Bruguera, serving for the match at 5-2 in the third set, dropped five straight games and lost to Sweden's Magnus Norman by 7-5, 1-6, 7-5 in the quarterfinals of the Bournemouth clay-court tournament in England. (AP)
Tammie Green had a hole-in-one and an eagle in an eight-under-par 64 yesterday to take the second-round lead in the Safeco Classic in Kent, Wash.

Green, a four-time winner in 10 seasons on the L.P.G.A. Tour, had a nine-under 135 total on the Meridian Valley course. The defending champion, Patty Sheehan, was two back along with Val Skinner, Sharon Barrett and Karrie Webb. (AP)

WILKINSON TAKES EARLY LEAD: Jim Wilkinson turned in his best round on the PGA Senior Tour, a six-under-par 66, to take the first-round lead in the Bank One Classic in Lexington, Ky. Wilkinson finished the par-72 Kearney Hill Links course with seven birdies and one bogey. (AP)

Fifth-seeded Sergi Bruguera, serving for the match at 5-2 in the third set, dropped five straight games and lost to Sweden's Magnus Norman by 7-5, 1-6, 7-5 in the quarterfinals of the Bournemouth clay-court tournament in England. (AP)
